caption: Boss demands report; I'm still on TikTok.
Meeting ends, boss says, "One more thing..."
Group project: everyone's childish, I'm the babysitter.
Coworker debates Star Wars at lunch, intensely.
Paycheck hits; rent takes the full roundhouse kick.
Pretending to know wine, Googling "wine facts."
Online dating: "Love your dog!" *it's a cat*
Competing for Wi-Fi, siblings turn into hackers.
"New phone, who dis?" - my empty bank account.
